document.full_text: nuclear plants remain one of the safest ways to make electricity, and britain should not allow japan's tsunami-provoked problems to delay its new build plans, uk scientists said on tuesday.
document.title: uk must push on with nuclear plans: scientists
lines_and_colors: nuclear plants remain one of the safest ways to make electricity, and britain should not allow japan's tsunami-provoked problems to delay its new build plans, uk scientists said on tuesday.
